name: 威廉·汤姆孙 (开尔文勋爵)
bio_short: 英国数学物理学家和工程师。他是热力学的奠基人之一，提出了绝对温标（开尔文温标），阐明了热力学第一和第二定律，并在跨大西洋电报电缆工程中发挥了关键作用。
bio_short_en: A British mathematical physicist and engineer. A founding father of thermodynamics, he proposed the absolute temperature scale (Kelvin scale), formulated the first and second laws of thermodynamics, and played a key role in the transatlantic telegraph cable.
